attributes.action: Reimburse NHS workers NMC and GMC fees
attributes.additional_details:
The NHS staff should not have to pay to be able to practice their jobs.
The government should cover the annual retention fee for full registration with a licence to practise for all NHS staff. 
Nurses pay around £120 and doctors pay around £400.
The Coronavirus has highlighted how selfless these people are. We must support them by taking action.
attributes.background: Scrap NMC and GMC registration fees for NHS staff permanently and refund them for this year.
